channel.title: Comments on: Caramelized Banana Upside Down Cake (AIP & Vegan)

item.title: By: Stephanie
item.dc:creator: Stephanie
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/caramelized-banana-upside-down-cake-aip-vegan/#comment-465">Elizabeth</a>.
Hi Elizabeth, thank you so much for taking the time to leave a review! I am thrilled that you and your family enjoyed the cake recipe. Makes me really happy to hear you enjoyed the texture and flavor.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Elizabeth.

Hi Elizabeth, thank you so much for taking the time to leave a review! I am thrilled that you and your family enjoyed the cake recipe. Makes me really happy to hear you enjoyed the texture and flavor.

item.title: By: Elizabeth
item.dc:creator: Elizabeth
item.description: Oh. My. Goodness. This cake is so good!!!! My daughter and I (on AIP DIET) and my husband (eats SAD) all love it. It’s moist and really banana-y with a great texture. I used my 6 inch spring form pan which is perfect. Came out easily and it doesn’t make too much dessert. (we don’t eat a lot of sweets) Thanks for the keeper recipe!
item.content:encoded: Oh. My. Goodness. This cake is so good!!!! My daughter and I (on AIP DIET) and my husband (eats SAD) all love it. It’s moist and really banana-y with a great texture. I used my 6 inch spring form pan which is perfect. Came out easily and it doesn’t make too much dessert. (we don’t eat a lot of sweets) Thanks for the keeper recipe!
